Protocols/SPUUserDriver.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -showUpdaterError:acknowledgement:

Protocols/SPUUserDriver.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -showDownloadInitiatedWithCancellation:

Protocols/SPUUserDriver.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Dismiss the current update installation

Protocols/SPUUserDriver.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -showUpdateInFocus
Protocols/SPUUserDriver.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Show the user the current presented update or its progress in utmost focus

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updater:mayPerformUpdateCheck:error:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Returns whether to allow Sparkle to check for updates.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -allowedChannelsForUpdater:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Returns the set of Sparkle channels the updater is allowed to find new updates from.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -feedURLStringForUpdater:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Returns a custom appcast URL used for checking for new updates.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -feedParametersForUpdater:sendingSystemProfile:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Returns additional parameters to append to the appcast URL’s query string.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updaterShouldPromptForPermissionToCheckForUpdates:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Returns whether Sparkle should prompt the user about checking for new updates automatically.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -allowedSystemProfileKeysForUpdater:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Returns an allowed list of system profile keys to be appended to the appcast URL’s query string.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updater:didFinishLoadingAppcast:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Called after Sparkle has downloaded the appcast from the remote server.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updater:didFindValidUpdate:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Called when a new valid update is found by the update driver.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updaterDidNotFindUpdate:error:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Called when a valid new update is not found.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updaterDidNotFindUpdate:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Called when a valid new update is not found.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -bestValidUpdateInAppcast:forUpdater:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Returns the item in the appcast corresponding to the update that should be installed.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updater:shouldProceedWithUpdate:updateCheck:error:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Returns whether or not the updater should proceed with the new chosen update from the appcast.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updater:userDidMakeChoice:forUpdate:state:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Called when a user makes a choice to install, dismiss, or skip an update.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updater:shouldDownloadReleaseNotesForUpdate:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Returns whether the release notes (if available) should be downloaded after an update is found and shown.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updater:willDownloadUpdate:withRequest:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Called immediately before downloading the specified update.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updater:didDownloadUpdate:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Called immediately after successful download of the specified update.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updater:failedToDownloadUpdate:error:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Called after the specified update failed to download.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -userDidCancelDownload:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Called when the user cancels an update while it is being downloaded.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updater:willExtractUpdate:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Called immediately before extracting the specified downloaded update.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updater:didExtractUpdate:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Called immediately after extracting the specified downloaded update.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updater:willInstallUpdate:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Called immediately before installing the specified update.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updater:shouldPostponeRelaunchForUpdate:untilInvokingBlock:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Returns whether the relaunch should be delayed in order to perform other tasks.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updaterShouldRelaunchApplication:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Returns whether the application should be relaunched at all.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updaterWillRelaunchApplication:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Called immediately before relaunching.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -versionComparatorForUpdater:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Returns an object that compares version numbers to determine their arithmetic relation to each other.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updater:willScheduleUpdateCheckAfterDelay:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Called when a background update will be scheduled after a delay.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updaterWillNotScheduleUpdateCheck:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Called when no update checks will be scheduled in the future.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -decryptionPasswordForUpdater:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Returns the decryption password (if any) which is used to extract the update archive DMG.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updater:willInstallUpdateOnQuit:immediateInstallationBlock:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Called when an update is scheduled to be silently installed on quit after downloading the update automatically.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updater:didAbortWithError:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Called after the update driver aborts due to an error.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updater:didFinishUpdateCycleForUpdateCheck:error:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Called after the update driver finishes.

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Undocumented

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.name: -updater:userDidSkipThisVersion:
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html#/c:obj.abstract: Undocumented

Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..name: -standardUserDriverWillShowModalAlert
Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..abstract: Called before showing a modal alert window,

Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..name: -standardUserDriverDidShowModalAlert
Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..abstract: Called after showing a modal alert window,

Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..name: -standardUserDriverRequestsVersionDisplayer
Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..abstract: Returns an object that formats version numbers for display to the user.

Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..name: -standardUserDriverShouldShowVersionHistoryForAppcastItem:
Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..abstract: Decides whether or not the standard user driver should provide an option to show full release notes to the user.

Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..name: -standardUserDriverShowVersionHistoryForAppcastItem:
Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..abstract: Handles showing the full release notes to the user.

Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..name: -standardUserDriverAllowsMinimizableStatusWindow
Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..abstract: Specifies whether or not the download, extraction, and installing status windows allows to be minimized.

Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..name: supportsGentleScheduledUpdateReminders
Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..abstract: Declares whether or not gentle scheduled update reminders are supported.

Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..name: -standardUserDriverShouldHandleShowingScheduledUpdate:andInImmediateFocus:
Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..abstract: Specifies if the standard user driver should handle showing a new scheduled update, or if its delegate should handle showing the update instead.

Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..name: -standardUserDriverWillHandleShowingUpdate:forUpdate:state:
Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..abstract: Called before an update will be shown to the user.

Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..name: -standardUserDriverDidReceiveUserAttentionForUpdate:
Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..abstract: Called when a new update first receives attention from the user.

Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..name: -standardUserDriverWillFinishUpdateSession
Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..abstract: Called before the standard user driver session will finish its current update session.

Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..name: -standardUserDriverWillShowReleaseNotesText:forUpdate:withBundleDisplayVersion:bundleVersion:
Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..abstract: Called before the standard user driver shows plain-text or markdown release notes text to the user.

Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..name: SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate
Protocols/SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate..abstract: A protocol for Sparkle’s standard user driver’s delegate

Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html.name: SPUUpdaterDelegate
Protocols/SPUUpdaterDelegate.html.abstract: Provides delegation methods to control the behavior of an SPUUpdater object.

Protocols/SPUUserDriver.html.name: SPUUserDriver
Protocols/SPUUserDriver.html.abstract: The API in Sparkle for controlling the user interaction.

Protocols/SUVersionDisplay.html.name: SUVersionDisplay
Protocols/SUVersionDisplay.html.abstract: Applies special display formatting to version numbers of the bundle to update and the update before presenting them to the user.

Enums/SPUNoUpdateFoundReason.html#/c:@E@.name: SPUNoUpdateFoundReasonUnknown
Enums/SPUNoUpdateFoundReason.html#/c:@E@.abstract: A new update is unavailable for an unknown reason.

Enums/SPUNoUpdateFoundReason.html#/c:@E@.name: SPUNoUpdateFoundReasonOnLatestVersion
Enums/SPUNoUpdateFoundReason.html#/c:@E@.abstract: A new update is unavailable because the user is on the latest known version in the appcast feed.

Enums/SPUNoUpdateFoundReason.html#/c:@E@.name: SPUNoUpdateFoundReasonOnNewerThanLatestVersion
Enums/SPUNoUpdateFoundReason.html#/c:@E@.abstract: A new update is unavailable because the user is on a version newer than the latest known version in the appcast feed.

Enums/SPUNoUpdateFoundReason.html#/c:@E@.name: SPUNoUpdateFoundReasonSystemIsTooOld
Enums/SPUNoUpdateFoundReason.html#/c:@E@.abstract: A new update is unavailable because the user’s operating system version is too old for the update.

Enums/SPUNoUpdateFoundReason.html#/c:@E@.name: SPUNoUpdateFoundReasonSystemIsTooNew
Enums/SPUNoUpdateFoundReason.html#/c:@E@.abstract: A new update is unavailable because the user’s operating system version is too new for the update.

Enums/SPUNoUpdateFoundReason.html#/c:@E@.name: SPUNoUpdateFoundReasonHardwareDoesNotSupportARM64
Enums/SPUNoUpdateFoundReason.html#/c:@E@.abstract: A new update is unavailable because the user’s system is an Intel Mac that doesn’t support ARM64.

Enums/SPUUserUpdateStage.html#/c:@E@SPUU.name: SPUUserUpdateStageDownloaded
Enums/SPUUserUpdateStage.html#/c:@E@SPUU.abstract: The update has already been downloaded but not begun installing.

Enums/SPUUserUpdateStage.html#/c:@E@SPUU.name: SPUUserUpdateStageInstalling
Enums/SPUUserUpdateStage.html#/c:@E@SPUU.abstract: The update has already been downloaded and began installing in the background.

Enums/SPUUserUpdateChoice.html#/c:@E@SPU.name: SPUUserUpdateChoiceSkip
Enums/SPUUserUpdateChoice.html#/c:@E@SPU.abstract: Dismisses the update and skips being notified of it in the future.

Enums/SPUUserUpdateChoice.html#/c:@E@SPU.name: SPUUserUpdateChoiceDismiss
Enums/SPUUserUpdateChoice.html#/c:@E@SPU.abstract: Dismisses the update until Sparkle reminds the user of it at a later time.

Enums/SPUUpdateCheck.html#/c:@E@SPUUpdat.name: SPUUpdateCheckUpdates
Enums/SPUUpdateCheck.html#/c:@E@SPUUpdat.abstract: The user-initiated update check corresponding to -[SPUUpdater checkForUpdates].

Enums/SPUUpdateCheck.html#/c:@E@SPUUpdat.name: SPUUpdateCheckUpdatesInBackground
Enums/SPUUpdateCheck.html#/c:@E@SPUUpdat.abstract: The background scheduled update check corresponding to -[SPUUpdater checkForUpdatesInBackground].

Enums/SPUUpdateCheck.html#/c:@E@SPUUpdat.name: SPUUpdateCheckUpdateInformation
Enums/SPUUpdateCheck.html#/c:@E@SPUUpdat.abstract: The informational probe update check corresponding to -[SPUUpdater checkForUpdateInformation].

Enums/SPUAppcastSigningValidationStatus..name: SPUAppcastSigningValidationStatusSkipped
Enums/SPUAppcastSigningValidationStatus..abstract: The bundle does not opt into requiring appcast signing and no validation of the appcast feed is done.

Enums/SPUAppcastSigningValidationStatus..name: SPUAppcastSigningValidationStatusSucceeded
Enums/SPUAppcastSigningValidationStatus..abstract: The appcast is signed and validation has passed succesfully.

Enums/SPUAppcastSigningValidationStatus..name: SPUAppcastSigningValidationStatusFailed
Enums/SPUAppcastSigningValidationStatus..abstract: The appcast is signed and validation has failed. In this case, appcast items operate in a ‘safe’ fallback mode

Enums/SPUUpdateCheck.html.name: SPUUpdateCheck
Enums/SPUUpdateCheck.html.abstract: Describes the type of update check being performed.

Enums/SPUUserUpdateChoice.html.name: SPUUserUpdateChoice
Enums/SPUUserUpdateChoice.html.abstract: A choice made by the user when prompted with a new update.

Enums/SPUUserUpdateStage.html.name: SPUUserUpdateStage
Enums/SPUUserUpdateStage.html.abstract: Describes the current stage an update is undergoing.

Enums/SPUNoUpdateFoundReason.html.name: SPUNoUpdateFoundReason
Enums/SPUNoUpdateFoundReason.html.abstract: The reason why a new update is not available.

Classes/SUUpdatePermissionResponse.html#.name: -initWithAutomaticUpdateChecks:sendSystemProfile:
Classes/SUUpdatePermissionResponse.html#.abstract: Initializes a new update permission response instance.

Classes/SUUpdatePermissionResponse.html#.name: -initWithAutomaticUpdateChecks:automaticUpdateDownloading:sendSystemProfile:
Classes/SUUpdatePermissionResponse.html#.abstract: Initializes a new update permission response instance.

Classes/SUUpdatePermissionResponse.html#.name: automaticUpdateChecks
Classes/SUUpdatePermissionResponse.html#.abstract: A read-only property indicating if update checks should be done automatically.

Classes/SUUpdatePermissionResponse.html#.name: automaticUpdateDownloading
Classes/SUUpdatePermissionResponse.html#.abstract: A read-only property indicating if updates should be automatically downloaded and installed.

Classes/SUUpdatePermissionResponse.html#.name: sendSystemProfile
Classes/SUUpdatePermissionResponse.html#.abstract: A read-only property indicating if system profile should be sent or not.

Classes/SUStandardVersionComparator.html.name: -init
Classes/SUStandardVersionComparator.html.abstract: Initializes a new instance of the standard version comparator.

Classes/SUStandardVersionComparator.html.name: -compareVersion:toVersion:
Classes/SUStandardVersionComparator.html.abstract: Compares two version strings through textual analysis.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: versionString
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The version of the update item.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: displayVersionString
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The human-readable display version of the update item if provided.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: fileURL
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The file URL to the update item if provided.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: contentLength
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The content length of the download in bytes.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: infoURL
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The info URL to the update item if provided.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: informationOnlyUpdate
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: Indicates whether or not the update item is only informational and has no download.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: title
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The title of the appcast item if provided.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: dateString
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The date string of the appcast item if provided.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: date
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The date constructed from the dateString property if provided.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: releaseNotesURL
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The release notes URL of the appcast item if provided.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: itemDescription
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The description of the appcast item if provided.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: itemDescriptionFormat
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The format of the itemDescription for inline/embedded release notes if provided.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: fullReleaseNotesURL
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The full release notes URL of the appcast item if provided.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: minimumSystemVersion
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The required minimum system operating version string for this update if provided.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: minimumOperatingSystemVersionIsOK
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: Indicates whether or not the current running system passes the minimumSystemVersion requirement.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: minimumUpdateVersion
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: This update will be ignored if the application’s version precedes this update’s minimum version.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: minimumUpdateVersionIsOK
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: Indicates whether or not the current bundle passes the minimumUpdateVersion requirement.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: maximumSystemVersion
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The required maximum system operating version string for this update if provided.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: maximumOperatingSystemVersionIsOK
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: Indicates whether or not the current running system passes the maximumSystemVersion requirement.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: hardwareRequirements
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The required hardware requirements for this update if provided.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: arm64HardwareRequirementIsOK
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: Indicates whether or not the current running system passes the arm64 requirement if specified in the hardwareRequirements requirement.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: channel
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The channel the update item is on if provided.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: installationType
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The installation type of the update at fileURL

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: signingValidationStatus
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The appcast signing validation status that this appcast item came from.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: phasedRolloutInterval
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The phased rollout interval of the update item in seconds if provided.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: minimumAutoupdateVersion
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: The minimum bundle version string this update requires for automatically downloading and installing updates if provided.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: majorUpgrade
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: Indicates whether or not the update item is a major upgrade.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: ignoreSkippedUpgradesBelowVersion
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: Previously skipped upgrades by the user will be ignored if they skipped an update whose version precedes this version.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: criticalUpdate
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: Indicates whether or not the update item is critical.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.name: osString
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html#/c:objc(cs)SU.abstract: Specifies the operating system the download update is available for if provided.

Classes/SPUStandardUpdaterController.htm.abstract: Accessible property for the updater’s user driver.

Classes/SPUStandardUpdaterController.htm.abstract: Starts the updater if it has not already been started.

Classes/SPUStandardUpdaterController.htm.name: -checkForUpdates:

Classes/SPUDownloadData.html#/c:objc(cs).name: textEncodingName

Classes/SPUDownloadData.html.abstract: A class for containing downloaded data along with some information about it.

Classes/SPUStandardUserDriver.html.abstract: Sparkle’s standard built-in user driver for updater interactions

Classes/SPUUpdatePermissionRequest.html.abstract: This class represents information needed to make a permission request for checking updates.

Classes/SPUUpdater.html.name: SPUUpdater
Classes/SPUUpdater.html.abstract: The main API in Sparkle for controlling the update mechanism.

Classes/SPUUpdaterSettings.html.name: SPUUpdaterSettings
Classes/SPUUpdaterSettings.html.abstract: This class can be used for reading and updating updater settings.

Classes/SPUUserUpdateState.html.name: SPUUserUpdateState
Classes/SPUUserUpdateState.html.abstract: This represents the user’s current update state.

Classes/SUAppcastItem.html.name: SUAppcastItem
Classes/SUAppcastItem.html.abstract: The appcast item describing an update in the application’s appcast feed.

Classes/SUUpdatePermissionResponse.html.name: SUUpdatePermissionResponse
Classes/SUUpdatePermissionResponse.html.abstract: This class represents a response for permission to check updates.

Classes/SUUpdater.html.name: SUUpdater
Classes/SUUpdater.html.abstract: The legacy API in Sparkle for controlling the update mechanism.
